scripts....build: compile a production build of the client and server
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts....deploy: build and deploy to the production AWS EB environment
scripts....deploy-dev: build and deploy to the development AWS EB environment
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && eb deploy web-experiments-dev
scripts....start: start the client and server using the production build
scripts....start-dev: start the client (detached) and server in live development mode
scripts.start-dev: npm run start-client-dev-detached && npm run start-server-dev
scripts....start-dev-detached: start the client and server in live development mode and detach them from the terminal
scripts.start-dev-detached: npm run start-client-dev-detached && npm run start-server-dev-detached
scripts....stop-dev: stop the detached client and server
scripts.stop-dev: npm run stop-client-dev && npm run stop-server-dev
scripts....build-server: compile a production build of the server
scripts....build-client: compile a production build of the client
scripts....start-server-dev: start the server in live development mode
scripts....start-server-dev-detached: start the server in live development mode and detach it from the terminal
scripts....start-client-dev: start the client in live development mode
scripts....start-client-dev-detached: start the client in live development mode and detach it from the terminal
